DOC.brief_summary: This exploratory study design help develop clinical model measure earlier stage dietary acid medicate enamel loss . The study use fluoride positive control explore validity design .
DOC.brief_title: In Vivo Investigation Initial Stages Enamel Erosion
DOC.criteria: Demonstrates understand study procedure , restriction willingness participate evidenced voluntary write informed consent receive sign date copy inform consent form . Absence condition would impact participant 's safety wellbeing , affect participant 's ability understand follow study procedures requirement . Two anterior maxillary teeth , without sign toothwear expose dentine , facial restoration , abutment fix removable partial denture , full crown veneer , orthodontic band crack enamel would interfere study evaluation .
